First stop Ireland, where President Obama said the US shares a blood link that goes beyond policy.
A royal welcome to Great Britain for the US President and First Lady.
Time for some "ping-pong diplomacy" in talks with British Prime Minister David Cameron.
President Obama says the United States and France are resolved to "finish the job" in Libya.
Last stop Poland, where the President laid a wreath at Poland's Tomb of the Unknown Soldier.
